        cdf <- postprob(

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
          x = x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
          p = (1 - delta) * p + delta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
          betamixPost = activeBetamixPost

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
        pdf <- with(

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    !
                    
                      
          controlBetamixPost,

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
          dbetaMix(x = p, par = par, weights = weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    !
                    
                      
        return(cdf * pdf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    !
                    
                      
      function(p) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
        cdf <- postprob(

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
          x = x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
          p = p + delta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    !
                    
                      
          betamixPost = activeBetamixPost

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
        pdf <- with(

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
          controlBetamixPost,

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    !
                    
                      
          dbetaMix(x = p, par = par, weights = weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    !
                    
                      
        return(cdf * pdf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
  ## do the integration. be careful to cover the region where there can

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
  ## really be any non-zero values. I.e. only integrate over the region where

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
  ## the beta density of the control is non-zero.

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    !
                    
                      
  epsilon <- 1e-13

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    !
                    
                      
  bounds <- with(

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    !
                    
                      
    controlBetamixPost,

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    !
                    
                      
    qbetaMix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
      q = c(epsilon, 1 - epsilon),

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
      par = par,

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    !
                    
                      
      weights = weights

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    !
                    
                      
  intRes <- integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    !
                    
                      
    f = integrand,

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    !
                    
                      
    lower = bounds[1],

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
    upper =

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    !
                    
                      
      min(

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
        ifelse(relativeDelta, 1, 1 - delta),

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
        bounds[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    !
                    
                      
  if (intRes$message == "OK") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    !
                    
                      
    return(intRes$value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    !
                    
                      
    stop(intRes$message)

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
postprobDist <- Vectorize(postprobDist, vectorize.args = "x")

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot the Beta distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' This function will plot the PDF of a beta distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param alpha first parameter of the Beta distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param beta second parameter of the Beta distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param \dots additional arguments to \code{plot}

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @return nothing, only produces the plot as side effect

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom graphics axis

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/myPlot.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords graphics

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
myPlot <- function(alpha, beta, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    !
                    
                      
  grid <- seq(from = 0, to = 1, length = 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    !
                    
                      
  xticks <- seq(from = 0, to = 1, by = 0.25)

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    !
                    
                      
  plot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    !
                    
                      
    x = grid,

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    !
                    
                      
    y = dbeta(grid, alpha, beta),

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    !
                    
                      
    ylab = "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    !
                    
                      
    xaxt = "n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    !
                    
                      
    yaxt = "n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    !
                    
                      
    type = "l",

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    !
                    
                      
    xaxs = "i",

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    !
                    
                      
    yaxs = "i",

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::axis(

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
    side = 1, at = xticks,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    !
                    
                      
    labels = paste(xticks * 100, "%", sep = "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot Diff Between two Beta distributions

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' This function will plot the PDF of a diffience between two Beta distributions

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @param parY non-negative parameters of the treatment Beta distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @param parX non-negative parameters of the historical control Beta distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cut_B a meaningful improvement threshold

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cut_W a poor improvement throshold

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @param shade paint the two areas under the curve, default value=1 as "yes". other numbers stands for "no";

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @param note show values of the colored area, default value=1 as "yes". other numbers stands for "no"

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' @param \dots additional arguments to \code{plot}

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' @return nothing, only produces the plot as side effect

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/myPlotDiff.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom graphics par axis polygon mtext

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats integrate

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords graphics

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
myPlotDiff <- function(parY, # parameters of phase Ib trial;

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
                       parX, # parameters of HC;

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
                       cut_B = 0.20, # a meaningful improvement threshold;

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
                       cut_W = 0.1, # a poor improvement threshold;

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
                       shade = 1, # paint the two areas under the curve, default: yes. other numbers stands for "no";

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
                       note = 1, # show values of the colored area, default: yes. other numbers stands for "no";

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
                       ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    !
                    
                      
  if (note == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::par(mar = c(5, 15, 1, 15) + .1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::par(mar = c(5, 5, 1, 5) + .1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
  grid <- seq(from = -0.5, to = 0.75, length = 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
  xticks <- seq(from = -1, to = 1, by = 0.25)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::plot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
    x = grid,

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
    y = dbetadiff(grid, parY = parY, parX = parX),

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
    ylab = "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
    xaxt = "n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
    yaxt = "n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
    type = "l",

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
    xaxs = "i",

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
    yaxs = "i",

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
    ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::axis(

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
    side = 1, at = xticks,

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
    labels =

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
      paste(ifelse(xticks >= 0, "+", ""),

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
        xticks * 100, "%",

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
        sep = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
  ## now color the go / stop prob areas

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
  if (shade == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
    ## first stop:

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
    stopGrid <- grid[grid <= cut_W]

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    !
                    
                      
    nStop <- length(stopGrid)

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::polygon(

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    !
                    
                      
      x =

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
        c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
          stopGrid,

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
          rev(stopGrid)

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
        ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
      y =

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
        c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
          rep(0, nStop),

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
          dbetadiff(rev(stopGrid), parY = parY, parX = parX)

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
        ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    !
                    
                      
      col = "red"

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    !
                    
                      
    A_value <- stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    !
                    
                      
      f = dbetadiff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    !
                    
                      
      parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    !
                    
                      
      parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    !
                    
                      
      lower = -1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    !
                    
                      
      upper = cut_W

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    !
                    
                      
    if (note == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    !
                    
                      
      graphics::mtext(

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    !
                    
                      
        paste("Prob(diff< ", round(cut_W * 100), "%)=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
          sprintf("%1.2f%%", 100 * as.numeric(A_value$value)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
          sep = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
        ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    !
                    
                      
        side = 2, line = 1, las = 1, cex = 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
    ## then go:

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
    goGrid <- grid[grid >= cut_B]

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    !
                    
                      
    nGo <- length(goGrid)

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::polygon(

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    !
                    
                      
      x =

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    !
                    
                      
        c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    !
                    
                      
          goGrid,

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    !
                    
                      
          rev(goGrid)

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
        ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    !
                    
                      
      y =

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    !
                    
                      
        c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    !
                    
                      
          rep(0, nGo),

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    !
                    
                      
          dbetadiff(rev(goGrid), parY = parY, parX = parX)

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
        ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    !
                    
                      
      col = "green"

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    !
                    
                      
    B_value <- stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    !
                    
                      
      f = dbetadiff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    !
                    
                      
      parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    !
                    
                      
      parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    !
                    
                      
      lower = cut_B,

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    !
                    
                      
      upper = 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    !
                    
                      
    if (note == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    !
                    
                      
      graphics::mtext(

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
        paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    !
                    
                      
          sprintf("%1.2f%%", 100 * as.numeric(B_value$value)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    !
                    
                      
          "=Prob(diff> ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    !
                    
                      
          round(cut_B * 100), "%)",

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    !
                    
                      
          sep = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
        ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    !
                    
                      
        side = 4,

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    !
                    
                      
        line = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    !
                    
                      
        las = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    !
                    
                      
        cex = 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include predprob.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate operating characteristics for predictive probability method

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' (gray zone allowed in the final analysis)

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' Decision rule 1:The trial is stopped for efficacy if the predictive probability of a

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' successful trial is larger than phiU, and stopped for futility if it is below

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' phiL. A trial is successful if after the maximum number of patients the

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' posterior probability of the treatment having more than p0 response rate is

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' above tT. Otherwise the decision is "failure". In this case, there is no gray zone.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' Decision rule 2:A variation can be requested when skipping the argument phiL and utilizing the arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' p1, tFu & PhiFu. The trial can be stopped for futility if the predictive

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' probability of an unsuccessful trial is larger than phiFu. In this case, the

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' decision is "failure" when the posterior probability of having the treatment

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' response rate at most p1 is above tFu at the maximum number of patients.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' Returned operating characteristics in a matrix include:

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' ExpectedN: expected number of patients in the trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' PrStopEarly: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEarlyEff: probability to decide for efficacy early

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEarlyFut: probability to decide for futility early

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEfficacy: probability to decide for efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' PrFutility: probability to decide for futility

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' PrGrayZone: probability of no decision at the end ("gray zone")

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nn vector of look locations for efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' (if futility looks should be different, please specify also \code{nnF})

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @param p true rate (scenario)

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @param p0 threshold on the response rate

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @param p1 futility threshold on the response rate. Specify only when decisian rule 2 is used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tT threshold for the probability to be above the response rate p0

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' at the end of the trial

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tFu threshold for the probability to be under the response rate p1

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' at the end of the trial. Specify only when decisian rule 2 is used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @param phiL lower threshold on the predictive probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @param phiU upper threshold on the predictive probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @param phiFu threshold on the predictive probability for futility. Specify only

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' when decisian rule 2 is used. phiL argument should be skipped in this case.

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @param parE beta parameters for the prior on the treatment proportion

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ns number of simulations

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nr generate random look locations? (not default)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @param d distance for random looks around the look locations in \code{nn}

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nnF vector of look locations for futility

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' (default: same as efficacy)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the following elements:

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' oc: matrix with operating characteristics (see Details section)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' Decision: vector of the decisions made in the simulated trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' (\code{TRUE} for success, \code{FALSE} for failure)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' SampleSize: vector of the sample sizes in the simulated trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' nn: vector of look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' nnE: vector of efficacy look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' nnF: vector of futility look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' params: multiple parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/ocPredprob.r

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
ocPredprob <- function(nn, p, p0, p1 = p0, tT, tFu = 1 - tT, phiL = 1 - phiFu, phiU, phiFu = 1 - phiL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
                       parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
                       ns = 10000, nr = FALSE, d = NULL, nnF = nn) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  # Calculate operating characteristics via simulation

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  # nn: vector of look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  # s: decision reject H0 (TRUE) or fail to reject (FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  #    during trial if continuing (NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    !
                    
                      
  if (phiL + phiFu != 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
    warning("Both phiL and phiFu arguments are specified, phiL will be overwrite by 1-phiFu")

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
  nnE <- sort(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
  nnF <- sort(nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
  s <- rep(NA, ns)

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
  n <- s

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
  nn <- sort(unique(c(nnF, nnE)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
  nL <- length(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
  Nstart <- nn[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
  Nmax <- nn[nL]

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
  if (nr && is.null(d)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
    # set parameter d for randomly generating look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
    d <- floor(min(nn - c(0, nn[-nL])) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
  nnr <- nn

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
  nnrE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
  nnrF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
  for (k in 1:ns) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    # simulate a clinical trial ns times

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
    if (nr && (d > 0)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
      # randomly generate look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
      dd <- sample(-d:d,

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
        size = nL - 1, replace = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
        prob = 2^(c(-d:0, rev(-d:(-1))) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
      nnr <- nn + c(dd, 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    !
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnr[nn %in% nnE]

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnr[nn %in% nnF]

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
    x <- stats::rbinom(Nmax, 1, p)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    !
                    
                      
    j <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    !
                    
                      
    i <- nnr[j]

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
    while (is.na(s[k]) && (j <= length(nnr))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
      if (i %in% nnrF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
        qL <- 1 - predprob(x = sum(x[1:i]), n = i, Nmax = Nmax, p = p1, thetaT = 1 - tFu, parE = parE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
        s[k] <- ifelse(qL > phiFu, FALSE, NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
      if (i %in% nnrE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    !
                    
                      
        q <- predprob(x = sum(x[1:i]), n = i, Nmax = Nmax, p = p0, thetaT = tT, parE = parE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    !
                    
                      
        s[k] <- ifelse(q >= phiU & !(i < Nmax & phiU == 1), TRUE, s[k])

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    !
                    
                      
      n[k] <- i

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    !
                    
                      
      j <- j + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    !
                    
                      
      i <- nnr[j]

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    !
                    
                      
  oc <- cbind(

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    !
                    
                      
    ExpectedN = mean(n), PrStopEarly = mean(n < Nmax),

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEarlyEff = sum(s * (n < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEarlyFut = sum((1 - s) * (n < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEfficacy = sum(s, na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
    PrFutility = sum(1 - s, na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    !
                    
                      
    PrGrayZone = sum(is.na(s) / ns)

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    !
                    
                      
  return(list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    !
                    
                      
    oc = oc, Decision = s, SampleSize = n,

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    !
                    
                      
    nn = nn, nnE = nnE, nnF = nnF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
    params = as.list(match.call(expand.dots = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
  ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include postprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate operating characteristics for posterior probability method

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' with beta prior on SOC

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' The trial is stopped for efficacy if the posterior probability to be at

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' least deltaE better than the control is larger than tU, and stopped for

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' futility if the posterior probability to be at least deltaF worse than the

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' control is larger than tL. Otherwise the trial is continued, and at the

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' maximum sample size it may happen that no decision is made ("gray zone").

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' Returned operating characteristics in a matrix include:

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' ExpectedN: expected number of patients in the trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' PrStopEarly: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEarlyEff: probability to decide for efficacy early

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEarlyFut: probability to decide for futility early

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEfficacy: probability to decide for efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' PrFutility: probability to decide for futility

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' PrGrayZone: probability of no decision at the end ("gray zone")

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nn vector of look locations for efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' (if futility looks should be different, please specify also \code{nnF})

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @param p true rate (scenario)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @param deltaE delta for efficacy: P(pE > pS + deltaE) should be large

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' to stop for efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @param deltaF delta for futility: P(pE < pS - deltaF) should be large to

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' stop for futility

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @param relativeDelta see \code{\link{postprobDist}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tL probability threshold for being below control - deltaF

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tU probability threshold for being above control + deltaE

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @param parE beta parameters for the prior on the treatment proportion

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @param parS beta parameters for the prior on the control proportion

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ns number of simulations

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nr generate random look locations? (not default)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @param d distance for random looks around the look locations in \code{nn}

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nnF vector of look locations for futility

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' (default: same as efficacy)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the following elements:

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' oc: matrix with operating characteristics (see Details section)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' Decision: vector of the decisions made in the simulated trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' (\code{TRUE} for success, \code{FALSE} for failure, \code{NA} for no

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' SampleSize: vector of the sample sizes in the simulated trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' nn: vector of look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' nnE: vector of efficacy look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' nnF: vector of futility look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' todo: would we like to return nnr instead, the actual look locations?

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' params: input parameters for this function

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/ocPostprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
ocPostprobDist <- function(nn, p, deltaE, deltaF, relativeDelta = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
                           tL, tU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
                           parE = c(a = 1, b = 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
                           parS = c(a = 1, b = 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
