                    99
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    !
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnr[nn %in% nnE]

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnr[nn %in% nnF]

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
    x <- stats::rbinom(Nmax, 1, p)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    !
                    
                      
    j <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    !
                    
                      
    i <- nnr[j]

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
    while (is.na(s[k]) && (j <= length(nnr))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
      if (i %in% nnrF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
        qL <- 1 - predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    !
                    
                      
          x = sum(x[1:i]), n = i, Nmax = Nmax, delta = deltaFu,

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
          relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
          thetaT = 1 - tFu,

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
          parE = parE, parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    !
                    
                      
        s[k] <- ifelse(qL >= phiFu, FALSE, NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    !
                    
                      
      if (i %in% nnrE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    !
                    
                      
        qU <- predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    !
                    
                      
          x = sum(x[1:i]), n = i, Nmax = Nmax, delta = delta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    !
                    
                      
          relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    !
                    
                      
          thetaT = tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    !
                    
                      
          parE = parE, parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    !
                    
                      
        s[k] <- ifelse(qU < phiU, s[k], TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
      n[k] <- i

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    !
                    
                      
      j <- j + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    !
                    
                      
      i <- nnr[j]

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    !
                    
                      
  oc <- cbind(

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
    ExpectedN = mean(n), PrStopEarly = mean(n < Nmax),

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEarlyEff = sum(s * (n < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEarlyFut = sum((1 - s) * (n < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEfficacy = sum(s, na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    !
                    
                      
    PrFutility = sum(1 - s, na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    !
                    
                      
    PrGrayZone = sum(is.na(s) / ns)

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    !
                    
                      
  return(list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    !
                    
                      
    oc = oc, Decision = s, SampleSize = n,

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    !
                    
                      
    nn = nn, nnE = nnE, nnF = nnF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    !
                    
                      
    params = as.list(match.call(expand.dots = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
  ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Display the operating characteristics using an oc object

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Reads results from \code{\link{ocPredprob}}, \code{\link{ocPostprob}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' etc. and displays a bar plot of the operating characteristics

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param z returned oc value

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @return nothing, only plots as side effect

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom graphics barplot title

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/plotOc.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords graphics

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
plotOc <- function(z) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
  ## plot function for oc.predprob or oc.postprob, or the dist versions of them

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::barplot(table(z$Decision, z$SampleSize) / z$params$ns, beside = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  ## get the parameter

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    !
                    
                      
  parDat <- lapply(z$params, deparse)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
  ## get parameters, which are saved in parDat

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    !
                    
                      
  allParNames <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    !
                    
                      
    "p", "p0", "p1",

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    !
                    
                      
    "delta", "deltaE", "deltaF", "relativeDelta",

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    !
                    
                      
    "phiL", "phiU", "tL", "tU", "tT", "parE", "parS"

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    !
                    
                      
  parInds <- which(names(parDat) %in% allParNames)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::title(paste(names(parDat[parInds]), parDat[parInds],

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    !
                    
                      
    sep = "=", collapse = ", "

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::title(xlab = paste(dimnames(z$oc)[[2]], signif(z$oc, 3),

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    !
                    
                      
    sep = " = ", collapse = ", "

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    !
                    
                      
  return(invisible())

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include sumTable.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot a summary plot corresponding to the sumTable output

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' This function will return a plot showing a curve of the prob of a meaningful improvement over estunated diff

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' and a curve of the prob of a poor improvement over estunated diff

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data the output object of \code{\link{sumTable}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param Pos_cut a cut off for the prob of a meaningful improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param Neg_cut a cut off for the prob of a poor improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @return the \code{data} item which was imputed to the function

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom graphics lines abline polygon plot par grid mtext box axis

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/plotDecision.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords graphics

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
plotDecision <- function(data, Pos_cut, Neg_cut) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    !
                    
                      
  xticks <- seq(from = -50, to = 100, by = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    !
                    
                      
  x <- as.numeric(data[1, ]) # number of response;

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    !
                    
                      
  x.mode <- as.numeric(data[3, ]) # the response diff mode

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    !
                    
                      
  y <- as.numeric(data[6, ]) # The Prob of a meaningful improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    !
                    
                      
  z <- as.numeric(data[7, ]) # The Prob of a not meaningful improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  # Look up decision area;

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    !
                    
                      
  ShadeData <- t(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
  colnames(ShadeData)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  # Green area;

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    !
                    
                      
  G_area <- ShadeData[ShadeData[, "prob.go [%]"] > Pos_cut, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
  # Red ares;

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
  R_area <- ShadeData[ShadeData[, "prob.nogo [%]"] > Neg_cut, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::par(mar = c(5, 4, 4, 1) + .1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::plot(x.mode, y,

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    !
                    
                      
    type = "n", xlim = range(x.mode), bty = "n", ylab = "Probability (%)", xaxt = "n", xaxs = "i", yaxs = "i",

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    !
                    
                      
    xlab = expression(paste("Estimated diff.", sep = "")), ylim = c(0, 100), panel.first = grid()

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  # find the interaction;

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  # Green area;

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
  aboveG <- ShadeData[, "prob.go [%]"] > Pos_cut

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  # Red ares;

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
  aboveR <- ShadeData[, "prob.nogo [%]"] > Neg_cut

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  # Points always intersect when above=TRUE, then FALSE or reverse

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
  intersect.pointsG <- which(diff(aboveG) != 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
  intersect.pointsR <- which(diff(aboveR) != 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
  # Find the slopes for each line segment.

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
  x1.slopesG <- (ShadeData[intersect.pointsG + 1, "prob.go [%]"] - ShadeData[intersect.pointsG, "prob.go [%]"]) /

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
    (ShadeData[intersect.pointsG + 1, "mode [%]"] - ShadeData[intersect.pointsG, "mode [%]"])

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    !
                    
                      
  x1.slopesR <- (ShadeData[intersect.pointsR + 1, "prob.nogo [%]"] - ShadeData[intersect.pointsR, "prob.nogo [%]"]) /

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    !
                    
                      
    (ShadeData[intersect.pointsR + 1, "mode [%]"] - ShadeData[intersect.pointsR, "mode [%]"])

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
  x2.slopes <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
  # Find the intersection for each segment.

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    !
                    
                      
  x.pointsG <- ShadeData[intersect.pointsG, "mode [%]"] +

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
    ((Pos_cut - ShadeData[intersect.pointsG, "prob.go [%]"]) / (x1.slopesG))

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
  y.pointsG <- Pos_cut

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
  x.pointsR <- ShadeData[intersect.pointsR, "mode [%]"] +

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
    ((Neg_cut - ShadeData[intersect.pointsR, "prob.nogo [%]"]) / (x1.slopesR))

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
  y.pointsR <- Neg_cut

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::polygon(c(R_area[, "mode [%]"], x.pointsR, x.pointsR, rev(R_area[, "mode [%]"])),

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
    c(rep(0, dim(R_area)[1] + 1), y.pointsR, rev(R_area[, "prob.nogo [%]"])),

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
    col = "red"

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::mtext(

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
    paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
      "Est. Diff=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
      round(x.pointsR),

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
      "%, Prob.nogo=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
      round(y.pointsR),

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
      "%",

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
      sep = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
    side = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
    line = 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::polygon(

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
    c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
      x.pointsG, G_area[, "mode [%]"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
      rev(G_area[, "mode [%]"]), x.pointsG

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
    c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    !
                    
                      
      rep(0, dim(G_area)[1] + 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
      rev(G_area[, "prob.go [%]"]), y.pointsG

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
    col = "green"

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    !
                    
                      
  ) # meaningful part;

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::mtext(

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
    paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
      "Est. Diff=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    !
                    
                      
      round(x.pointsG),

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
      "%,Prob. go=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
      round(y.pointsG),

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
      "%",

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
      sep = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    !
                    
                      
    side = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    !
                    
                      
    line = 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::lines(x.mode, y, col = "green", lwd = 3, type = "l") # Plot PDF of beta(R,NR);

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::lines(x.mode, z, col = "red", lwd = 3, type = "l")

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    !
                    
                      
  if (Pos_cut == Neg_cut) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::abline(h = Pos_cut, col = "black", lwd = 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::box()

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    !
                    
                      
  LablePoint2 <- unique(sort(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    !
                    
                      
    ceiling(min(x.mode) * 10) / 10,

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    !
                    
                      
    xticks, floor(max(x.mode) * 10) / 10

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    !
                    
                      
  ))) ## Can be modified

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::axis(1, at = LablePoint2, labels = paste(LablePoint2, "%", sep = ""), las = 1, lwd = 2, cex.axis = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
  return(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#' Checking for scalar

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x the input

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Returns \code{TRUE} if \code{x} is a length one vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' (i.e., a scalar)

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
is.scalar <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    !
                    
                      
  return(identical(length(x), 1L))

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' Predicate checking for a boolean option

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x the object being checked

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Returns \code{TRUE} if \code{x} is a length one logical vector (i.e., a

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' scalar)

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
is.bool <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    !
                    
                      
  return(is.scalar(x) && is.logical(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' Predicate checking for a probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x the object being checked

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @param bounds whether to include the bounds 0 and 1 (default)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Returns \code{TRUE} if \code{x} is a probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
is.probability <- function(x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
                           bounds = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    !
                    
                      
  return(is.scalar(x) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    !
                    
                      
    if (bounds) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    !
                    
                      
      0 <= x && 1 >= x

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
      0 < x && 1 > x

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' Predicate checking for a probability range

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x the object being checked

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @param bounds whether to include the bounds 0 and 1 (default)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Returns \code{TRUE} if \code{x} is a probability range

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
is.probRange <- function(x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
                         bounds = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
  return(identical(length(x), 2L) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
    x[1] < x[2] &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
    if (bounds) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
                    
                      
      0 <= x[1] && 1 >= x[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
      0 < x[1] && 1 > x[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' The Logit Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' This just calculates the logit.

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed x: numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#'   probabilities to transform.

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The logit of `x`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/logit.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
logit <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    2x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(x, lower = 0, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    2x
                    
                      
  stats::qlogis(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include postprob.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate operating characteristics for posterior probability method

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' The trial is stopped for efficacy if the posterior probability to be

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' above p1 is larger than tU, and stopped for futility if the posterior

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' probability to be below p0 is larger than tL.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' Returned operating characteristics in a matrix include:

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' ExpectedN: expected number of patients in the trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' PrStopEarly: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEarlyEff: probability to decide for efficacy early

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEarlyFut: probability to decide for futility early

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEfficacy: probability to decide for efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' PrFutility: probability to decide for futility

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' PrGrayZone: probability of no decision at the end ("gray zone")

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nn vector of look locations for efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' (if futility looks should be different, please specify also \code{nnF})

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @param p true rate (scenario)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @param p0 lower efficacy threshold

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @param p1 upper efficacy threshold

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tL probability threshold for being below p0

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tU probability threshold for being above p1

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @param parE beta parameters for the prior on the treatment proportion

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ns number of simulations

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nr generate random look locations? (not default)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @param d distance for random looks around the look locations in \code{nn}

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nnF vector of look locations for futility

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' (default: same as efficacy)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the following elements:

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' oc: matrix with operating characteristics (see Details section)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' Decision: vector of the decisions made in the simulated trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' (\code{TRUE} for success, \code{FALSE} for failure, \code{NA} for no

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' SampleSize: vector of the sample sizes in the simulated trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' nn: vector of look locations that was supplied

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' nnE: vector of efficacy look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' nnF: vector of futility look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' params: multiple parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/ocPostprob.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
ocPostprob <- function(nn, p, p0, p1, tL, tU, parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
                       ns = 10000, nr = FALSE, d = NULL, nnF = nn) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
  # Calculate operating characteristics via simulation

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  # nn: vector of look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
  # s: decision reject H0 (TRUE) or fail to reject (FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  #    during trial if continuing (NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  ## copy nn to nnE:

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
                    
                      
  nnE <- sort(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
  nnF <- sort(nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
  s <- rep(NA, ns)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
  n <- s

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
  nn <- sort(unique(c(nnF, nnE)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
  nL <- length(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    !
                    
                      
  Nstart <- nn[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
  Nmax <- nn[nL]

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
  if (nr && is.null(d)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    # set parameter d for randomly generating look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    !
                    
                      
    d <- floor(min(nn - c(0, nn[-nL])) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
  nnr <- nn

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    !
                    
                      
  nnrE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    !
                    
                      
  nnrF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
  for (k in 1:ns) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
    # simulate a clinical trial ns times

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
    if (nr && (d > 0)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
      # randomly generate look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
      dd <- sample(-d:d,

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
        size = nL - 1, replace = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
        prob = 2^(c(-d:0, rev(-d:(-1))) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
      nnr <- nn + c(dd, 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnr[nn %in% nnE]

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnr[nn %in% nnF]

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
    x <- stats::rbinom(Nmax, 1, p)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
    j <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
    i <- nnr[j]

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
    while (is.na(s[k]) && (j <= length(nnr))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
      if (i %in% nnrF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
        qL <- 1 - postprob(x = sum(x[1:i]), n = i, p = p0, parE = parE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
        s[k] <- ifelse(qL >= tL, FALSE, NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
      if (i %in% nnrE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
        qU <- postprob(x = sum(x[1:i]), n = i, p = p1, parE = parE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
        s[k] <- ifelse(qU < tU, s[k], TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
      n[k] <- i

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
      j <- j + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
      i <- nnr[j]

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    !
                    
                      
  oc <- cbind(

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
    ExpectedN = mean(n), PrStopEarly = mean(n < Nmax),

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEarlyEff = sum(s * (n < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEarlyFut = sum((1 - s) * (n < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEfficacy = sum(s, na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    !
                    
                      
    PrFutility = sum(1 - s, na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
    PrGrayZone = sum(is.na(s) / ns)

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
  return(list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    !
                    
                      
    oc = oc, Decision = s, SampleSize = n,

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
    nn = nn, nnE = nnE, nnF = nnF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
    params = as.list(match.call(expand.dots = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
  ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include predprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#' @include helpers.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate operating characteristics for RCT against SOC,

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' using the predictive probability method with beta priors

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' The randomization works as follows. According to the randomization ratio and

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' the maximum sample size, patients are allocated to the treatment and SOC

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' arms. The number of patients in the active treatment arm is rounded to the

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' next higher integer. That is, the sequence of patients is determined from

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' the start, such that the number of patients in both arms is constant across

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' trial simulations.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' Decision rule 1:The trial is stopped for efficacy if the predictive probability of a

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' successful trial is larger than phiU, and stopped for futility if it is below

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
