#' phiL. A trial is successful if after the maximum number of patients the

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' posterior probability of the treatment being at least delta better than the

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' control is above tT. Otherwise the decision is "failure". Hence there is no

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' gray zone.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' Decision rule 2:A variation can be requested when skipping the argument phiL and utilizing the arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' p1, tFu & PhiFu. The trial can be stopped for futility if the predictive

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' probability of an unsuccessful trial is larger than phiFu. In this case, the

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' decision is "failure" when the posterior probability of having the treatment

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' response rate at most p1 is above tFu at the maximum number of patients.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' Returned operating characteristics in a matrix include:

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' ExpectedN: expected number of patients in the trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' ExpectedNactive: expected number of patients with treatment

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' ExpectedNcontrol: expected number of patients with SOC

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' PrStopEarly: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEfficacy: probability to decide for efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' PrFutility: probability to decide for futility

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' PrGrayZone: probability of no decision at the end ("gray zone")

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nn vector of look locations for efficacy . Note that the maximum sample size is

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' derived as the maximum value (latest look) in this vector.

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' (if futility looks should be different, please specify also \code{nnF})

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @param pE true rate in the treatment population

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @param pS true rate in the standard of care population

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @param delta We want to be better than the control + delta (default: 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @param deltaFu declare futility when worse than the control + deltaW.

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' Specify only when decisian rule 2 is used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @param relativeDelta see \code{\link{postprobDist}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tT threshold for the probability to be above control + delta

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' at the end of the trial

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tFu threshold for the probability to be under control + deltaFu

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' at the end of the trial. Specify only when decisian rule 2 is used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' @param phiL lower threshold on the predictive probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @param phiU upper threshold on the predictive probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @param phiFu threshold on the predictive probability for futility. Specify only

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' when decisian rule 2 is used. phiL argument should be skipped in this case.

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @param parE beta parameters for the prior on the control proportion

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @param parS beta parameters for the prior on the treatment proportion

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' @param randRatio the randomization ratio (active vs. control) to be used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' default: 1.

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ns number of simulations

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nr generate random look locations? (not default)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' @param d distance for random looks around the look locations in \code{nn}

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nnF vector of look locations for futility

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' (default: same as efficacy)

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the following elements:

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' oc: matrix with operating characteristics (see Details section)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' Decision: vector of the decisions made in the simulated trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' (\code{TRUE} for success, \code{FALSE} for failure)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' SampleSize: vector of the sample sizes in the simulated trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' SampleSizeActive: vector of the patients with treatment in the simulated trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' SampleSizeControl: vector of the patients with control in the simulated trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' nn: vector of look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' nnE: vector of efficacy look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' nnF: vector of futility look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' todo: would we like to return nnr instead, the actual look locations?

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' params: input parameters of this function

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/ocRctPredprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
ocRctPredprobDist <- function(nn, pE, pS, delta = 0, deltaFu = delta, relativeDelta = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
                              tT, tFu = 1 - tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
                              phiL = 1 - phiFu, phiU, phiFu = 1 - phiL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
                              parE = c(a = 1, b = 1), parS = c(a = 1, b = 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
                              randRatio = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
                              ns = 10000, nr = FALSE, d = NULL, nnF = nn) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
  ## checks

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
  stopifnot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
    is.probability(pE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
    is.probability(pS),

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
    is.probability(delta),

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
    is.bool(relativeDelta),

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
    is.probability(tT),

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
    is.probability(phiL),

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
    is.probability(phiU),

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
    randRatio > 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
    is.scalar(ns),

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
    is.bool(nr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
  ## s: decision reject H0 (TRUE) or fail to reject (FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
  ##    during trial if continuing (NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
  if (phiL + phiFu != 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    !
                    
                      
    warning("Both phiL and phiFu arguments are specified, phiL will be overwrite by 1-phiFu")

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    !
                    
                      
  nnE <- sort(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
  nnF <- sort(nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
  s <- rep(NA, ns)

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
  n <- nActive <- nControl <- s

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    !
                    
                      
  ns <- as.integer(ns)

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
  nn <- sort(unique(c(nnF, nnE)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
  nL <- length(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
  Nstart <- nn[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
  Nmax <- nn[nL]

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
  ## proportion of active patients:

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    !
                    
                      
  activeProp <- randRatio / (randRatio + 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
  ## determine number of active and control patients

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    !
                    
                      
  NmaxActive <- ceiling(activeProp * Nmax)

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    !
                    
                      
  NmaxControl <- Nmax - NmaxActive

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    !
                    
                      
  if (nr && is.null(d)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
    ## set parameter d for randomly generating look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    !
                    
                      
    d <- floor(min(nn - c(0, nn[-nL])) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    !
                    
                      
  nnr <- nn

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    !
                    
                      
  nnrE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
  nnrF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
  for (k in 1:ns) { ## simulate a clinical trial ns times

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    !
                    
                      
    if (nr && (d > 0)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
      ## randomly generate look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    !
                    
                      
      dd <- sample(-d:d,

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    !
                    
                      
        size = nL - 1, replace = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    !
                    
                      
        prob = 2^(c(-d:0, rev(-d:(-1))) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
      nnr <- nn + c(dd, 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    !
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnr[nn %in% nnE]

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnr[nn %in% nnF]

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
    ## simulate sequence of patients

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    !
                    
                      
    isActive <- sample(

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    !
                    
                      
      x = rep(c(TRUE, FALSE), c(NmaxActive, NmaxControl)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    !
                    
                      
      size = Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    !
                    
                      
      replace = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
    ## simulate sequence of responses

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    !
                    
                      
    x <- stats::rbinom(Nmax, 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    !
                    
                      
      prob = ifelse(isActive, pE, pS)

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    !
                    
                      
    j <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    !
                    
                      
    i <- nnr[j]

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    !
                    
                      
    while (is.na(s[k]) && (j <= length(nnr))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
      ## current data in both arms:

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    !
                    
                      
      xActive <- x[which(isActive[1:i])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    !
                    
                      
      xControl <- x[which(!isActive[1:i])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
      ## compute predictive probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    !
                    
                      
      if (i %in% nnrF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
        qL <- 1 - predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    !
                    
                      
          x = sum(xActive), n = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    !
                    
                      
          xS = sum(xControl), nS = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    !
                    
                      
          Nmax = NmaxActive, NmaxControl = NmaxControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    !
                    
                      
          delta = deltaFu,

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    !
                    
                      
          relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    !
                    
                      
          thetaT = 1 - tFu,

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    !
                    
                      
          parE = parE, parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    !
                    
                      
        s[k] <- ifelse(qL >= phiFu, FALSE, NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    !
                    
                      
      if (i %in% nnrE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    !
                    
                      
        q <- predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    !
                    
                      
          x = sum(xActive), n = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    !
                    
                      
          xS = sum(xControl), nS = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    !
                    
                      
          Nmax = NmaxActive, NmaxControl = NmaxControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    !
                    
                      
          delta = delta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    !
                    
                      
          relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    !
                    
                      
          thetaT = tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    !
                    
                      
          parE = parE, parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
        ## make the decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    !
                    
                      
        s[k] <- ifelse(q >= phiU & !(i < Nmax & phiU == 1), ## (1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    !
                    
                      
          TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    !
                    
                      
          s[k]

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
      ## what happens if phiU == 1?

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
      ## then q >= phiU will always be FALSE, except for the last iteration

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
      ## when i == Nmax -> then it will be 1 or 0.

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
      ## If it is 1, then the first condition (1) will be TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
      ## so it will be "success".

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
      ## sample sizes: total and in both arms

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    !
                    
                      
      n[k] <- i

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    !
                    
                      
      nActive[k] <- length(xActive)

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    !
                    
                      
      nControl[k] <- length(xControl)

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    !
                    
                      
      j <- j + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    !
                    
                      
      i <- nnr[j]

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    !
                    
                      
  oc <- cbind(

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    !
                    
                      
    ExpectedN = mean(n),

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    !
                    
                      
    ExpectedNactive = mean(nActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    !
                    
                      
    ExpectedNcontrol = mean(nControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    !
                    
                      
    PrStopEarly = mean(n < Nmax),

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEarlyEff = sum(s * (n < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEarlyFut = sum((1 - s) * (n < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEfficacy = sum(s, na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    !
                    
                      
    PrFutility = sum(1 - s, na.rm = TRUE) / ns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    !
                    
                      
    PrGrayZone = sum(is.na(s) / ns)

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    !
                    
                      
  return(list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    !
                    
                      
    oc = oc, Decision = s, SampleSize = n,

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    !
                    
                      
    SampleSizeActive = nActive,

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    !
                    
                      
    SampleSizeControl = nControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    !
                    
                      
    nn = nn, nnE = nnE, nnF = nnF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    !
                    
                      
    params = as.list(match.call(expand.dots = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
  ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include boundsPredprob.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#' @include boundsPostprob.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot the boundary decision cutpoints

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' This function will plot the response rate on the futility and efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' boundaries, and is used together with \code{\link{boundsPredprob}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' and \code{\link{boundsPostprob}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param z an output of \code{\link{boundsPredprob}} and

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{boundsPostprob}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param area color the futility/efficacy stop area

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param grid show the grid of y-axis or not

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @param yt  indicate the y axis: response rate is "p", number of responses

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' is "x"

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param add  add the boundary lines or not

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cols specific the color of `[1]` efficacy area `[2]` futility area

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' `[3]` efficacy boundary `[4]` futility boundary

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lwds line width (a two dimensional vector)

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ltype line type

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lpch  a value of plotting characters or symbols

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lcex a value giving the amount by which plotting characters and

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' symbols should be scaled relative to the default.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @param gy a value to adjust the gray level of the plot (default 20),

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' applies when \code{grid==TRUE}

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @return nothing, only produces the plot as side effect

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom graphics lines abline polygon plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/plotBounds.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords graphics

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
plotBounds <- function(z, area = TRUE, grid = TRUE, yt = "x", add = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
                       cols = c("green", "red", "darkgreen", "orange"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
                       lwds = c(3, 3), ltype = "l", lpch = 16, lcex = 1, gy = 20) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
  n <- nrow(z)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
  nmin <- min(z$nvec)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
  nmax <- max(z$nvec)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    !
                    
                      
  if (yt == "x") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    !
                    
                      
    z1 <- z$xL

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    !
                    
                      
    z2 <- z$xU

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    !
                    
                      
    yU <- nmax

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    !
                    
                      
    yU2 <- nmin

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    !
                    
                      
    ylabel <- "Number of Responses"

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    !
                    
                      
    gridy <- seq(0, yU, by = floor(yU / gy))

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    !
                    
                      
  } else if (yt == "p") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    !
                    
                      
    z1 <- z$pL

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    !
                    
                      
    z2 <- z$pU

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
    yU <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
    yU2 <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
    ylabel <- "Response Rate"

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
    gridy <- seq(0, yU, by = yU / gy)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("yt can only be x or p")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
  if (add) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::lines(z$nvec, z2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[1], col = cols[3], type = ltype,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    !
                    
                      
      pch = lpch, cex = lcex

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::lines(z$nvec, z1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[2], col = cols[4], type = ltype,

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    !
                    
                      
      pch = lpch, cex = lcex

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
    return(invisible())

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::plot(z$nvec, rep(0, n),

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
    xlim = c(0, max(z$nvec)), ylim = c(0, yU), type = "n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
    xlab = "n", ylab = ylabel

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
  if (grid) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::abline(h = gridy, col = "gray")

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
  if (area) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::polygon(c(z$nvec, nmax, nmin), c(z2, yU, yU2),

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[1],

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
      col = cols[1], border = cols[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::polygon(c(z$nvec, nmax, nmin), c(z1, 0, 0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[2],

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
      col = cols[2], border = cols[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::lines(z$nvec, z2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[1], col = cols[1], type = ltype,

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
      pch = lpch, cex = lcex

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::lines(z$nvec, z1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[2], col = cols[2], type = ltype,

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
      pch = lpch, cex = lcex

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
  return(invisible())

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-binomial density function

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculates the density function of the beta-binomial distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Note that \code{x} can be a vector.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' The beta-binomial density function has the following form:

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' \deqn{p(x) = (m! / (x!*(m-x)!)) * Beta(x+a,m-x+b) / Beta(a,b)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x number of successes

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param m number of trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param a first parameter of the beta distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param b second parameter of the beta distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @return the density values of the beta-binomial distribution at \code{x}

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/dbetabinom.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
dbetabinom <- function(x, m, a, b) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    !
                    
                      
  logRet <- lchoose(m, x) + lbeta(x + a, m - x + b) - lbeta(a, b)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    !
                    
                      
  exp(logRet)

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-mixture-binomial density function

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculates the density function for a mixture of beta-binomial distributions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' Note that \code{x} can be a vector.

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x number of successes

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @param m number of trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @param par the beta parameters matrix, with K rows and 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' corresponding to the beta parameters of the K components

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @param weights the mixture weights of the beta mixture prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @param log return the log value? (not default)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The (log) density values of the mixture of beta-binomial distributions at \code{x}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
dbetabinomMix <- function(x, m, par, weights, log = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    !
                    
                      
  ret <- sum(weights * dbetabinom(x, m, par[, 1], par[, 2]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    !
                    
                      
  if (log) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    !
                    
                      
    return(log(ret))

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    !
                    
                      
    return(ret)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
dbetabinomMix <- Vectorize(dbetabinomMix, vectorize.args = "x")

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' Computes the posterior parameters of a beta mixture

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x number of successes

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @param n number of patients

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' @param par the beta parameters matrix, with K rows and 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' corresponding to the beta parameters of the K components

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @param weights the mixture weights

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a list with the updated beta parameters and weights

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats dbeta dbinom

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/getBetamixPost.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
getBetamixPost <- function(x, n, par, weights) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  ## check the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    !
                    
                      
  stopifnot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
    is.matrix(par),

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    !
                    
                      
    is.numeric(par),

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    !
                    
                      
    identical(ncol(par), 2L),

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
    all(par > 0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
    identical(nrow(par), length(weights)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
    all(weights > 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  ## renormalize weights

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
  weights <- weights / sum(weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  ## now compute updated parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
  postPar <- par

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
  postPar[, 1] <- postPar[, 1] + x

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
  postPar[, 2] <- postPar[, 2] + n - x

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
  postParProb <- postPar[, 1] / (postPar[, 1] + postPar[, 2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
  ## compute updated mixture probabilities

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
  tmp <- exp(

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
    stats::dbinom(x, size = n, prob = postParProb, log = TRUE) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
      stats::dbeta(postParProb, par[, 1], par[, 2], log = TRUE) -

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
      stats::dbeta(postParProb, postPar[, 1], postPar[, 2], log = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
  postWeights <- weights * tmp / sum(weights * tmp)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
  return(list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
    par = postPar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
    weights = postWeights

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
  ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-mixture density function

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' Note that \code{x} can be a vector.

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x the abscissa

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' @param par the beta parameters matrix, with K rows and 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' corresponding to the beta parameters of the K components

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' @param weights the mixture weights of the beta mixture prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' @param log return the log value? (not default)

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' @return the (log) density values

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
dbetaMix <- function(x, par, weights, log = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
  ret <- sum(weights * dbeta(x, par[, 1], par[, 2]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
  if (log) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
    return(log(ret))

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    !
                    
                      
    return(ret)

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
dbetaMix <- Vectorize(dbetaMix, vectorize.args = "x")

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-mixture cdf

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
