#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' Note that \code{x} can be a vector.

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x the abscissa

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#' @param par the beta parameters matrix, with K rows and 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' corresponding to the beta parameters of the K components

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#' @param weights the mixture weights of the beta mixture prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lower.tail logical; if TRUE (default), probabilities are `P[X <= x]`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#' and otherwise `P[X > x]`

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#' @return the (one minus) cdf value

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
pbetaMix <- function(x, par, weights, lower.tail = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    !
                    
                      
  ret <- sum(weights * pbeta(x, par[, 1], par[, 2], lower.tail = lower.tail))

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
  return(ret)

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
pbetaMix <- Vectorize(pbetaMix, vectorize.args = "x")

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-mixture quantile function

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#' Note that \code{q} can be a vector.

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#' @param q the required quantile

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#' @param par the beta parameters matrix, with K rows and 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#' corresponding to the beta parameters of the K components

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#' @param weights the mixture weights of the beta mixture prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' @return the abscissa

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
qbetaMix <- function(q, par, weights) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    !
                    
                      
  f <- function(pi) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    !
                    
                      
    pbetaMix(x = pi, par = par, weights = weights) - q

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    !
                    
                      
  unirootResult <- uniroot(f, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    !
                    
                      
  if (unirootResult$iter < 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    !
                    
                      
    return(NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    !
                    
                      
    return(unirootResult$root)

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
qbetaMix <- Vectorize(qbetaMix, vectorize.args = "q")

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
##' @include betadiff.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
##' Mode and Credible Interval Calculation for The Difference between Two Beta Distributions

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
##' A function to summerize the characters of a betadiff distribution \code{\link{betadiff}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
##' @param parX two parameters of X's beta distribution (Control)

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
##' @param parY two parameters of Y's beta distribution (Treatment)

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
##' @param level credible interval

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
##' @param cutB  a cutoff value for the upper bound

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
##' @param cutW  a cutoff value for the lower bound

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
##' @return sumbetadiff gives the mode, credible interval of the distribution function,

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
##' along with the probabilities of above cutB and below cutW.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
##' @importFrom stats optimize integrate rbeta quantile

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
##' @example examples/sumbetadiff.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
##' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
sumBetadiff <- function(parY, parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
                        level = 0.9, ## CI level

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
                        cutB,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
                        cutW) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    !
                    
                      
  res <- try(

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    !
                    
                      
      mode <- stats::optimize(

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    !
                    
                      
        f = dbetadiff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    !
                    
                      
        interval = c(-0.999, 0.999),

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    !
                    
                      
        parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    !
                    
                      
        maximum = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    !
                    
                      
      )$maximum

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
      lower <- qbetadiff(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
        p = (1 - level) / 2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    !
                    
                      
        parX = parX

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    !
                    
                      
      upper <- qbetadiff(

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    !
                    
                      
        p = (1 + level) / 2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    !
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    !
                    
                      
        parX = parX

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
      ## for Go:

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
      Out.go <- stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
        f = dbetadiff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
        parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
                    
                      
        lower = cutB,

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
        upper = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
        subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
        rel.tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.1

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
      )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
      ## for Stop:

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
      Out.nogo <- stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
        f = dbetadiff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    !
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    !
                    
                      
        parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    !
                    
                      
        lower = -1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
        upper = cutW,

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    !
                    
                      
        subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    !
                    
                      
        rel.tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.1

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
      )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
      list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
        mode = mode,

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
        ci = c(lower, upper),

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
        go = Out.go,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
        nogo = Out.nogo

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
    silent = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  ## if there were any errors, fall back to Monte Carlo estimation

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
  if (inherits(res, "try-error")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
    samples <- stats::rbeta(n = 2e6, parY[1], parY[2]) -

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
      rbeta(n = 2e6, parX[1], parX[2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
    lower <- stats::quantile(samples, prob = (1 - level) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
    upper <- stats::quantile(samples, prob = (1 + level) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
    Out.go <- mean(samples > cutB)

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
    Out.nogo <- mean(samples < cutW)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
    samples <- cut(samples, breaks = seq(from = -1, to = 1, length = 801))

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
    samples <- table(samples)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
    mode <- seq(from = -1, to = 1, by = 0.0025)[which.max(samples)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
    res <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
      mode = mode,

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
      ci = c(lower, upper),

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    !
                    
                      
      go = Out.go,

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
      nogo = Out.nogo

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
  return(res)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' The Difference between Two Beta Distributions

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Density, distribution function and quantile function for

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' the distribution of the difference of two beta distributions with parameters parX and parY

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param z vector of differences

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param q vector of quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param p vector of probabilities

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param parX two parameters of X's beta distribution (Control)

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param parY two parameters of Y's beta distribution (Treatment)

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @return \code{dbetadiff} gives the density, \code{pbetadiff} the distribution function,

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{qbetadiff} the quantile function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/betadiff.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @name betadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats dbeta integrate

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname betadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
dbetadiff <- function(z, parY, parX) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    !
                    
                      
  ret <- z

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  ## determine which z are positive and which negative

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    !
                    
                      
  zPos <- z >= 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    !
                    
                      
  zNeg <- z < 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  ## use epsilon to avoid infinite function values

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    !
                    
                      
  eps <- .Machine$double.eps

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    !
                    
                      
  integrandPos <- function(x, zval) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    !
                    
                      
    exp(

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
      stats::dbeta(x = x, parX[1], parX[2], log = TRUE) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    !
                    
                      
        stats::dbeta(x = x + zval, parY[1], parY[2], log = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
  integrandNeg <- function(y, zval) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
    exp(

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
      stats::dbeta(x = y, parY[1], parY[2], log = TRUE) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    !
                    
                      
        stats::dbeta(x = y - zval, parX[1], parX[2], log = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    !
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_along(z)[zPos]) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    !
                    
                      
    ret[i] <- stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    !
                    
                      
      f = integrandPos,

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    !
                    
                      
      lower = eps, upper = 1 - z[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    !
                    
                      
      zval = z[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    !
                    
                      
      subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
      rel.tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.1

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
    )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_along(z)[zNeg]) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
    ret[i] <- stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
      f = integrandNeg,

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
      lower = eps, upper = 1 + z[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
      zval = z[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
      subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    !
                    
                      
      rel.tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.1

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
    )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    !
                    
                      
  return(ret)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats integrate

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname betadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
pbetadiff <- function(q, parY, parX) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
  stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
    f = dbetadiff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
    parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
    parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
    lower = -1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
    upper = q,

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
    subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
    rel.tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.1

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
  )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats uniroot

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname betadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
qbetadiff <- function(p, parY, parX) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
  target <- function(q) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
    pbetadiff(

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
      q = q,

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
      parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
      parX = parX

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
    ) - p

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
  eps <- 1e-10

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
  stats::uniroot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
    f = target,

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
    interval = c(-1 + eps, 1 - eps)

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
  )$root

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
##' Launch the ShinyPhase1b app

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
##' Launch the ShinyPhase1b app in the default web browser.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
##' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
runShinyPhase1b <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    !
                    
                      
  appDir <- system.file("shinyapp", "ShinyPhase1b", package = "phase1b")

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    !
                    
                      
  if (appDir == "") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("Could not find phase1b app directory. Try re-installing `phase1b`.", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    !
                    
                      
  shiny::runApp(appDir, display.mode = "normal")

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
# reference https://www.r-bloggers.com/supplementing-your-r-package-with-a-shiny-app-2/;

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
##' Return summary statistics under one response scenario

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
##' This function will calculate the summary statistics for a specific response

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
##' outcome scenario.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
##' @param thisResp number of responses

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
##' @param TotalSample sample size

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
##' @param cut_B a meaningful improvement threshold: at least cut_B (e.g. 15%) improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
##' @param cut_W a poor improvement threshold: at most cut_W (e.g. 5%) improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
##' @param parX non-negative parameters of the beta distribution of the control (posterior)

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
##' @param YPri non-negative parameters of the beta prior of the treatment, default Beta(0.5,0.5)

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
##' @param Round Rounding of the output statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
##' @return A vector with the results.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
##'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
##' @example examples/sumTable.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
##' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
sumTable <- function(thisResp, # number of responses;

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
                     TotalSample, # Sample size;

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
                     cut_B, # meaningful improvement: at least cut_B (say 15\%) improvement;

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
                     cut_W, # poor improvement: at most cut_W (say 5\%) improvement;

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
                     parX, # Two parameters of the beta distribution of the control (posterior);

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
                     YPri = c(0.5, 0.5), # Prior of phase Ib trial, default Beta(0.5,0.5)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
                     Round = 2) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    !
                    
                      
  tmp <- sumBetadiff(

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    !
                    
                      
    parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    !
                    
                      
    parY =

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    !
                    
                      
      c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    !
                    
                      
        thisResp + YPri[1],

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    !
                    
                      
        TotalSample - thisResp + YPri[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
    cutB = cut_B,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    !
                    
                      
    cutW = cut_W

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    !
                    
                      
  summaries <- round(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
    thisResp, thisResp / TotalSample * 100,

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
    tmp$mode * 100, tmp$ci * 100, tmp$go * 100, tmp$nogo * 100

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
  ), Round)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    !
                    
                      
  summaries <- as.data.frame(summaries)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    !
                    
                      
  rownames(summaries) <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    !
                    
                      
    "# resp", "obs ORR [%]", "mode [%]",

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    !
                    
                      
    "CI lower [%]", "CI upper [%]", "prob.go [%]", "prob.nogo [%]"

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    !
                    
                      
  return(summaries)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
}
